text: Krasnogvardeyskoye (; ) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Krasnogvardeysky District of the Republic of Adygea, Russia, located on the shores of Krasnodar Reservoir some northwest of Maykop. Population: ==References== Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Krasnogvardeyskoye, Republic of Adygea
